Package com.itkolleg.bookingsystem.controller.room

Class RoomWebController

java.lang.Object
com.itkolleg.bookingsystem.controller.room.RoomWebController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/web/rooms") public class RoomWebController extends Object
The RoomWebController class handles HTTP requests related to rooms in the booking system. It provides methods for adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving rooms. The class is annotated with @Controller to indicate that it is a Spring MVC controller. The base request mapping for the class is "/web/rooms".
Author:
Patrick Bayr

  • Method Details

    • allrooms

      @GetMapping("/allRooms") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView allrooms() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Handles the GET request for "/allRooms" endpoint. Retrieves all rooms from the RoomService and returns a ModelAndView with the rooms.
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the "room/allRooms" view and the list of rooms
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if an execution exception occurs
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted

    • allroomsEmployee

      @GetMapping("/allRoomsEmployee") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView allroomsEmployee() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Handles the GET request for "/allRoomsEmployee" endpoint. Retrieves all rooms from the RoomService and returns a ModelAndView with the rooms for employees.
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the "room/allRoomsEmployee" view and the list of rooms for employees
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if an execution exception occurs
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted

    • addRoom

      @GetMapping("/addRoom") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView addRoom(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request for "/addRoom" endpoint. Initializes a new room object and adds it to the model.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to be used
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the "room/addRoom" view and the room model

    • addRoom

      @PostMapping("/addRoom") public String addRoom(@Valid @Valid Room room, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Handles the POST request for "/addRoom" endpoint. Adds a new room to the RoomService if there are no binding errors, otherwise returns the "/room/addRoom" view.
      Parameters:
      room - the room object to be added
      bindingResult - the binding result object
      Returns:
      a redirect URL to "/web/rooms/allRooms" on success, or the "/room/addRoom" view on errors
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if an execution exception occurs
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted

    • updateRoom

      @GetMapping("/updateRoom/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateRoom(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws RoomNotFoundException, ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Handles the GET request for "/updateRoom/{id}" endpoint. Retrieves the room with the specified ID from the RoomService and adds it to the model.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the room to be updated
      model - the model to be used
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the "room/editRoom" view and the room model
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room is not found
      ExecutionException - if an execution exception occurs
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted

    • updateroom

      @PostMapping("/updateRoom") public String updateroom(@Valid @Valid Room room, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException, RoomNotFoundException
      Handles the POST request for "/updateRoom" endpoint. Updates the room in the RoomService if there are no binding errors, otherwise returns the "/room/editRoom" view.
      Parameters:
      room - the updated room object
      bindingResult - the binding result object
      Returns:
      a redirect URL to "/web/rooms/allRooms" on success, or the "/room/editRoom" view on errors
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if an execution exception occurs
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room is not found

    • deleteroom

      @GetMapping("/deleteRoom/{id}") public String deleteroom(@PathVariable Long id)
      Handles the GET request for "/deleteRoom/{id}" endpoint. Deletes the room with the specified ID from the RoomService.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the room to be deleted
      Returns:
      a redirect URL to "/web/rooms/allRooms" on success or if deletion is not possible, or the "/web/rooms/allRooms" view if an exception occurs

    • allfloors

      @GetMapping("/floors") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView allfloors() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Handles the GET request for "/floors" endpoint. Retrieves all rooms from the RoomService and returns a ModelAndView with the floors.
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the "room/floors" view and the list of floors
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if an execution exception occurs
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted

    • allfloorsemployee

      @GetMapping("/floorsEmployee") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView allfloorsemployee() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Handles the GET request for "/floorsEmployee" endpoint. Retrieves all rooms from the RoomService and returns a ModelAndView with the floors for employees.
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the "room/floorsEmployee" view and the list of floors for employees
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if an execution exception occurs
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted
